meanings.definition: The quality or state of being comfortable and cozy, as in a home.
meanings.sent1: The hominess of the cabin made it the perfect place to relax after a long hike.
meanings.sent2: I love the hominess of my grandma's house with its warm colors and soft blankets.
meanings.sent3: The hominess of the tiny cottage made it feel like a cozy nest for the weekend.
meanings.sent4: The hominess of the cafe enveloped me like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The hominess of the living room was so inviting that I never wanted to leave.

meanings.definition: A feeling of warmth and familiarity associated with being at home.
meanings.sent1: After traveling for weeks, the hominess of my own bed was a welcome comfort.
meanings.sent2: The hominess of the family gathering filled me with a sense of belonging.
meanings.sent3: The hominess of the old bookstore made me want to curl up with a good book.
meanings.sent4: The hominess of the small town reminded me of simpler times.
meanings.sent5: The hominess of the fireplace brought back memories of cozy winter nights.
